title: HET Bipolar System
description: Hemorrhoid energy therapy, using the HET bipolar system, is a non-surgical treatment method for symptomatic grades I and II internal hemorrhoids.
cleaned_text: The HET bipolar system is a gentle, simple, and efficient([FOOTNOTE=Kantsevoy S, Bitner M. Nonsurgical treatment of actively bleeding internal hemorrhoids with a novel endoscopic device (with video). Gastrointest Endosc. 2013 Oct;78(4):649-653.],[ANCHOR=],[LINK=]) non-surgical treatment method for symptomatic grades I and II internal hemorrhoids.1 It's design allows treatment of all grade I and grade II internal hemorrhoids in one procedure.1 The treatment targets the area above the dentate line and its low treatment temperature minimizes collateral tissue damage.([FOOTNOTE=Piskun G, Tucker R. New bipolar tissue ligator combines constant tissue compression and temperature guidance: histologic study and implications for treatment of hemorrhoids. Med Devices (Auckl). 2012 Oct;5:89-96.],[ANCHOR=],[LINK=]) Hemorrhoid Energy Therapy, using the HET bipolar system, can be completed quickly with minimal pain to the patient.1,2 Many hemorrhoid treatments, including banding and infrared coagulation, often require multiple procedures.([FOOTNOTE=Ganz RA.The evaluation and treatment of hemorrhoids: a guide for the gastroenterologist.
